action.action-desc: Mr. Pearce introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to transfer certain National Forest System land in the State of New Mexico.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Village of Santa Clara Conveyance Act of 2018.

paragraph.text: The term map means the map entitled Village of Santa Clara Conveyance Act 2018 and dated February 21, 2018.
The term Secretary means the Secretary of Agriculture, acting through the Chief of the Forest Service.

section.header: Conveyance of land and improvements to the village of Santa Clara, New Mexico

subsection.text: Subject to the provisions of this Act, if the Village of Santa Clara, New Mexico, submits to the Secretary a written request for conveyance, the Secretary shall convey to the Village of Santa Clara all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to approximately 1,520 acres of National Forest System land, as generally depicted on the map.

paragraph.text: The map shall be kept on file and available for public inspection in the appropriate office of the Forest Service.
The Secretary may correct minor errors in the map.

As consideration for the conveyance of land under subsection (a), the Village of Santa Clara shall pay to the Secretary an amount equal to the market value of the land, as determined by the appraisal under subsection (g).
The amount described in paragraph (1) may be paid in periodic installments to the Secretary.

Upon receipt of an installment pursuant to paragraph (2), the Secretary shall convey to the Village of Santa Clara all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a parcel of the land described subsection (a) that is equal in value to such installment and identified by the Village of Santa Clara at the time such installment is paid.

subsection.text: The conveyance under subsection (a) shall be—

paragraph.text: subject to the reservation by the Secretary of an access easement over and across Fort Bayard Road; and
subject to any other terms and conditions as the Secretary considers appropriate to protect the interests of the United States.

subsection.text: As a condition for the conveyance under subsection (a) and in addition to the consideration paid under subsection (c), the Village of Santa Clara shall pay for all costs associated with the conveyance, including for—

paragraph.text: any environmental analysis and resource surveys determined necessary by Federal law; and

subsection.text: The actual acreage and legal description of the National Forest System land to be conveyed under subsection (a) shall be determined by a survey satisfactory to the Secretary; notwithstanding section 7 of title 43, United States Code, the Secretary is authorized to perform and approve any required cadastral surveys.
The Secretary shall complete an appraisal of the land to be conveyed under subsection (a) in accordance with—

paragraph.text: the Uniform Appraisal Standards for Federal Land Acquisitions; and
the Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice.

subsection.text: All funds received under subsection (c) shall be deposited into the account for, and treated as, excess funds under section 604(e) of the Healthy Forests Restoration Act of 2003 (16 U.S.C. 6591c(e)).
